MIME-Version: 1.0

--===============1309900484==
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/x-po; charset="utf-8"
Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="fi.po"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

msgid ""
msgstr ""
"Project-Id-Version: ntop\n"
"Report-Msgid-Bugs-To: opal@debian.org\n"
"POT-Creation-Date: 2006-08-16 07:38+0200\n"
"PO-Revision-Date: 2008-04-20 17:28+0200\n"
"Last-Translator: Esko Araj=C3=A4rvi <edu@iki.fi>\n"
"Language-Team: Finnish <debian-l10n-finnish@lists.debian.org>\n"
"MIME-Version: 1.0\n"
"Content-Type: text/plain; charset=3DUTF-8\n"
"Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit\n"
"Plural-Forms: nplurals=3D2; plural=3D(n !=3D 1);\n"
"X-Poedit-Language: Finnish\n"
"X-Poedit-Country: FINLAND\n"

#. Type: string
#. Description
#: ../templates:1001
msgid "Which is the name of the user to run the ntop daemon as ?"
msgstr "K=C3=A4ytt=C3=A4j=C3=A4tunnus, jolla ntop-taustaohjelmaa ajetaan:=
"

#. Type: string
#. Description
#: ../templates:1001
msgid "The selected user will be created if not already available. Don't =
choose root, it is not recommended and will be discarded anyway."
msgstr "Annettu tunnus luodaan, jos sit=C3=A4 ei viel=C3=A4 ole olemassa.=
 =C3=84l=C3=A4 valitse p=C3=A4=C3=A4k=C3=A4ytt=C3=A4j=C3=A4tunnusta (root=
). Sit=C3=A4 ei tulisi k=C3=A4ytt=C3=A4=C3=A4, eik=C3=A4 sit=C3=A4 kuiten=
kaan hyv=C3=A4ksyt=C3=A4."

#. Type: string
#. Description
#: ../templates:1001
msgid "If you select an empty string no user will be created on the syste=
m and you will need to do that configuration yourself."
msgstr "Jos kentt=C3=A4 j=C3=A4tet=C3=A4=C3=A4n tyhj=C3=A4ksi, j=C3=A4rje=
stelm=C3=A4=C3=A4n ei luoda mit=C3=A4=C3=A4n k=C3=A4ytt=C3=A4j=C3=A4=C3=A4=
 ja asetukset on teht=C3=A4v=C3=A4 k=C3=A4sin."

#. Type: string
#. Description
#: ../templates:2001
msgid "Which interfaces should ntop listen on?"
msgstr "Kuunneltavat liit=C3=A4nn=C3=A4t:"

#. Type: string
#. Description
#: ../templates:2001
msgid "Please enter a comma separated list of interfaces ntop should list=
en on."
msgstr "Anna pilkuilla eroteltu lista verkkoliit=C3=A4nn=C3=B6ist=C3=A4, =
joita ntopin tulisi kuunnella."
